directions.text: Process flour, sugar, and yeast for 2 secs.
With Processor running slowly add water.
Add oil and salt to the dough and process.
Knead the dough on a floured surface until a good consistency.
Shape the dough into a tight ball and place it in a lightly oiled bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before using.
To make the sauce process all ingredients until smooth.
Put dough on a lightly oiled surface, cover loosely with lightly greased plastic and let sit for 1 hour.
Put oven rack close to the top and heat oven to 500Â°.
Coat dough with flour and flatten it to an 12" disk with raised edges.
Spread sauce over dough, sprinkle with parmesan then mozzarella.
Bake for 11 mins, rotating the pizza halfway through.
